plot: A moving documentary about hazing, chronicling the tragic events that led to the death of a Plattsburgh State student in March 2003.
title: Unless a Death Occurs: Hazing Examined
plot_es: A moving documentary about hazing, chronicling the tragic events that led to the death of a Plattsburgh State student in March 2003.
original_name: Unless a Death Occurs: Hazing Examined
plot_en: A moving documentary about hazing, chronicling the tragic events that led to the death of a Plattsburgh State student in March 2003.
